nodes.text: The Bug Stomper was a Low Altitude Assault Transport/infantry that took part in the Second Battle of Geonosis. The nose of the gunship was painted with a clone trooper's foot squashing a Geonosian, and the ship's name written in Aurebesh.

Like many other references to the 1986 movie Aliens present in the "Legacy of Terror" episode, "Bug Stomper" was also the name of the Colonial Marines' dropship in the famous science fiction film.[source?]
